pages.text: $(li)The Cattail Seeds can be plant in farmland to generate more Cattail Seeds.$(br)$(li)You can use Cattail Seeds to craft $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/string)String$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:utility/environmental/cattail_seed_sack)Cattail Seed Sacks$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) too.
$(li)Finally you can put Cattail Seeds in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/composter)Composter$(/l) to generate $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone_meal)Bone Meal$(/l).
